// AUTHOR: ARVIND NAIR

#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef vector<int> vi;

#define s(x)   scanf("%ld",&x)
#define rep(a,b,c)   for ( long int (a)=(b); (a)<(c); (a)++)
#define repn(a,b,c)  for ( long int (a)=(b); (a)<=(c); (a)++)
#define repd(a,b,c)  for (  long int (a)=(b); (a)>=(c); (a)--)
#define all(v) (v).begin(),(v).end()
#define fi  first
#define se  second
#define pb  push_back
#define mp  make_pair
#define INF (int)1e9
#define EPS (double)(1e-9)
#define M(x,i) memset(x,i,sizeof(x))
#define trace(x)    cout<<#x<<" is "<<x<<"\n"

bool prime[10005];
long int divisor[200002]={0};

int main()
{ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);  cin.tie(0); 
//freopen("/home/arvind/Downloads/     .txt","r",stdin);
//freopen("   .txt","w",stdout);
M(prime,1);
repn(i,2,1000)  {
   if(!prime[i])
   continue;
   for(long int j=i*i;j<=10000;j+=i)
    prime[j]=false;
}
ll t; cin>>t;
while(t--) {   M(divisor,0);
  ll l,r,ans=0;   cin>>l>>r;
  for(ll i=1;i*i<=r;i++)  {  ll s=i*i;
     for(ll j=((l-1)/i+1)*i;j<=r;j+=i) {

       if(j<s)
       continue;
       if(j==s)
       divisor[j-l]+=1;
       else
       divisor[j-l]+=2;
       }
  }
  repn(i,l,r)
  ans+=(prime[divisor[i-l]]==true?1:0);
  cout<<ans<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
